title: RHONY Recap - Lu with a Ladle, Sonja with a Lady, & A Gangster Lunch
itunes:title: RHONY Recap - Lu with a Ladle, Sonja with a Lady, & A Gangster Lunch
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's RHONY, which featured a gangster lunch, Lu doing community service, Sonja making out with a stranger, Dorinda's realtor, & SO much more. Also a few thoughts on #RHOBH/Southern Charm.RHOBH/SouthernCharm- 43:35is...
description:
Danny recaps this week's RHONY, which featured a gangster lunch, Lu doing community service, Sonja making out with a stranger, Dorinda's realtor, & SO much more. Also a few thoughts on #RHOBH/Southern Charm.


RHOBH/SouthernCharm- 43:35ish


To support this pod & access bonus eps, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
